verses.name: Psalms 119:89
verses.text: For ever, O Lord, thy word is settled in heaven.

verses.name: Psalms 119:90
verses.text: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.

verses.name: Psalms 119:91
verses.text: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.

verses.name: Psalms 119:92
verses.text: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.

verses.name: Psalms 119:93
verses.text: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.

verses.name: Psalms 119:94
verses.text: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.

verses.name: Psalms 119:95
verses.text: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.
